name: Twin Souls (Floca)
description:
Game story

The main characters are two twins who died at the same time and ended up in purgatory. As they were bound in life so they were bound in death.  Player controls both characters at the same time.

Game mechanics

Controls : W A S D 

The player controls both characters with the same commands (W A S D) , when one ghost moves at the same time and the other ghost moves in the same direction.

The goal of the game is for the player with both ghosts to reach the goal at the same time, if one ghost enters the goal before the other ghost it will be the end of the game

Various traps are set by levels that player must watch out for, if the ghost touches the trap it will be the end of the game.

By levels there are also other ghosts that player can gather to save them.

Team members : 

Tomislav Klepac
